title: Drawing, "Design for Runner with Copper Sheet Inlay"
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed on verso in graphite, lower right corner:  Sketch for/runner with copper/sheet inlay
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Blue, orange and brown rectangles and squares; large in the middle and small at upper and lower edges.
